text: @BorisJohnson @RishiSunak It was obvious with anyone who could think that this lockdown, the extent and method was going to damage the country far more than COVID19. Compare Swedeen who are still lower than us. Even now, hiding behind #COVID19 to slowly return. You have bad advisors. Time to fire.
